channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: A thriving Muslim school in Alabama looked to expand, but was met with Islamophobia
item.description: A Muslim school near Birmingham, Ala., was thriving — winning academic awards, increasing enrollment and looking to expand. Then came the lawn signs, the first warning that trouble was on the way.
item.content:encoded: A Muslim school near Birmingham, Ala., was thriving — winning academic awards, increasing enrollment and looking to expand. Then came the lawn signs, the first warning that trouble was on the way.
item.dc:creator: Vahini Shori

item.title: It's hard to tell, so far, what Trump has planned for the Kennedy Center
item.description: NPR's Scott Detrow talks with David Graham of The Atlantic about President Trump's vision for the Kennedy Center and the intersection of art and politics.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Scott Detrow talks with David Graham of The Atlantic about President Trump's vision for the Kennedy Center and the intersection of art and politics.
item.dc:creator: Henry Larson

item.title: Minneapolis has daily deportation flights. One man is documenting them
item.description: A professional airplane enthusiast has been tracking the federally chartered deportation flights out of the Minneapolis airport as DHS sends detainees to other states and, eventually, other countries.
item.content:encoded: A professional airplane enthusiast has been tracking the federally chartered deportation flights out of the Minneapolis airport as DHS sends detainees to other states and, eventually, other countries.
item.dc:creator: Kat Lonsdorf

item.title: VA staff feel the chill of Alex Pretti's death
item.description: Alex Pretti was an ICU nurse at the VA Hospital in Minneapolis. Some staff feel the VA Secretary hasn't done enough to honor their colleague.
item.content:encoded: Alex Pretti was an ICU nurse at the VA Hospital in Minneapolis. Some staff feel the VA Secretary hasn't done enough to honor their colleague.
item.dc:creator: Quil Lawrence

item.title: NASA delays the launch of Artemis II lunar mission by at least a month
item.description: NASA is targeting March for the launch of four astronauts on a ten-day mission to circle the moon and return safely to Earth, traveling farther than any humans have ventured in deep space.
item.content:encoded:
NASA is targeting March for the launch of four astronauts on a ten-day mission to circle the moon and return safely to Earth, traveling farther than any humans have ventured in deep space.

(Image credit: Miguel J. Rodriguez Carrillo)
item.dc:creator: Brendan Byrne

item.title: What we know about Savannah Guthrie's missing mother
item.description: Nancy Guthrie is 84 and has mobility issues, but she is mentally sharp, Pima County Sheriff Chris Nanos said. She was last seen Saturday evening at her home near Tucson, Ariz.
item.content:encoded:
Today show co-host Savannah Guthrie, went missing on Sunday. While Nancy Guthrie has mobility issues, Sheriff Chris Nanos said that she "is of great sound mind. This is not a dementia-related" case.'/>

Nancy Guthrie is 84 and has mobility issues, but she is mentally sharp, Pima County Sheriff Chris Nanos said. She was last seen Saturday evening at her home near Tucson, Ariz.
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell

item.title: Despite a 'ruptured' knee ligament, Lindsey Vonn says she will compete in the Olympics
item.description: The 41-year-old's remarkable comeback from retirement was thrown into jeopardy after she hurt her knee during a crash in competition last week. But that won't keep her from racing in the Olympics.
item.content:encoded:
The 41-year-old's remarkable comeback from retirement was thrown into jeopardy after she hurt her knee during a crash in competition last week. But that won't keep her from racing in the Olympics.

(Image credit: Hans Bezard)
item.dc:creator: Becky Sullivan

item.title: Takeaways from the latest Epstein files. And, police search for Savannah Guthrie's mom
item.description: NPR analyzes the latest Jeffrey Epstein files. And, Arizona authorities launched an urgent search for Savannah Guthrie's 84-year-old mother, Nancyafter a suspected home abduction.
item.content:encoded:
NPR analyzes the latest Jeffrey Epstein files. And, Arizona authorities launched an urgent search for Savannah Guthrie's 84-year-old mother, Nancyafter a suspected home abduction.

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: 19 Winter Olympic storylines we're watching (they're not just about sports)
item.description: The Winter Olympics promise plenty of high adrenaline, fierce competition, historic firsts and emotional moments over 2 1/2 weeks. Here are some of the names and narratives to keep an eye on.
item.content:encoded: The Winter Olympics promise plenty of high adrenaline, fierce competition, historic firsts and emotional moments over 2 1/2 weeks. Here are some of the names and narratives to keep an eye on.
item.dc:creator: NPR Staff

item.title: Privatizing Fannie Mae is risky. Would it be a win for taxpayers or Trump's donors?
item.description: The idea has alarmed critics, who warn it could rattle financial markets and drive up mortgage rates, while potentially generating large profits for key Trump supporters.
item.content:encoded:
The idea has alarmed critics, who warn it could rattle financial markets and drive up mortgage rates, while potentially generating large profits for key Trump supporters.

(Image credit: J. David Ake)
item.dc:creator: Chris Arnold
